Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.28372989] Gram-positive bacteria :Bacillus subtilis(MIC=1 μM, MBC=1 μM), Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=8 μM, MBC=8 μM);Gram-negative bacteria :Escherichia coli(MIC=8 μM, MBC=32 μM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.28372989] MHC5=86.67 μM against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: [Ref.28372989] IC50 > 86.67 μM for hPBMCs. The cell viability of hPBMCs is 92.4%, 83.2%, 82.4%, 76% and 68% at peptide concentrations of 0.33, 0.67, 6.67, 12.33 and 86.67 μM.
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-negative bacteria

Literature.Title: Modulating short tryptophan- and arginine-rich peptides activity by substitution with histidine.
Literature.Reference: Biochim Biophys Acta Gen Subj. 2017 Jul;1861(7)1844-1854. doi 10.1016/j.bbagen.2017.03.024.
Literature.Author: Bacalum M, Janosi L, Zorila F, Tepes AM, Ionescu C, Bogdan E, Hadade N, Craciun L, Grosu I, Turcu I, Radu M
